entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Rigolet
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this afternoon then cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas late in the afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
